sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHYME Rhimk, Ryrne, or Rime, in Poetry, the similar sound or cadence and termination of two words which end two verses, &c. Or rhyme is a similitude of sound between the last syllable or syllables of a verse, succeeding either immediately or at a distance of two or three lines.
